ComicInfo.Title: The Death of Balder; Hymir's Fishing Expedition
ComicInfo.Summary:
Odin travels to the ends of the world to find the cause of his son Baldur's nightmares, only to learn of his child's imminent demise and the oncoming doom of the gods.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-29 10:29:08. [CVDB910750]
